title: [K-12] Flipped Learning-Based Educational Technology Integration Strategies for Secondary Music Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Music Theory and Singing Instruction Experience
context.additional_context: Designed for pre-service music teachers aiming to strengthen their educational technology competencies. Conducted in a blended learning environment utilizing personal devices.

learning_goals: Enhance secondary music lesson design competencies using a flipped learning model.
Operate individualized vocal training programs utilizing digital tools (Riyaz, Sing Sharp, etc.).
Analyze learner engagement and technology integration effects through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
